description: I design, develop and maintain internal web applications, I also design databases and analyse data pertaining networks, revenue and customer usage.
I designed, planed and developed backend payment systems on AWS for ERP services, I also migrated and improved old services and host them on AWS.
Worked in a team supporting a real time intelligence application for a big South African Telco company, resolving incidents, deploying and managing applications, managing servers.
I was based on a team responsible for collecting and issuing personal loans. Develop java based applications, to solve all the related business scenarios.
Worked with a team dealing with processing user requests for business-to-business transactions and process. Develop applications to test and validate user information and handle user requests.
